sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Dual fluorescent protein reporter for SARS-CoV-2 programmed -1 ribosomal frameshifting. GFP is in-frame with mCherry. Thus GFP translation is prevented by stop codon within FSE (negative control)..
